reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate of drug habituation across major substance classes: benzodiazepines (~30 per 100k), opioids (~50 per 100k), stimulants (~40 per 100k), cannabis (~20 per 100k), other drugs (~10 per 100k) = ~150 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneous definition and overlap with addiction, limited specific epidemiological data.
